preference.name: OCS_use_email_property
preference.preference_description: For the Teamcenter integration with Microsoft Office Communicator, specifies whether to use the e-mail ID from the e-mail ID field of the user Person object. Valid Values: true - The e-mail ID is taken from the user Person object e-mail data. false - The e-mail ID consists of the user ID and the value of the OCS_company_email_domain preference.
